supply and demand.translation[0].definit: the relationship between the quantity of goods for sale and the quantity of goods that people want to buy, especially the way it influences prices
the law of supply and demand
supply and demand.translation[1].definit: the relationship between the amount of products and services that are for sale and the amount that people want to buy, especially in the way this affects prices
the widening gap between supply and demand
Thelaws of supply and demand clearly contribute to higher prices.
